item.title: TBBT (Tidy)Text analysis 1 - IMDB scores and character mentions
item.description: Welcome to the first post in my ‘The Big Bang Theory (Tidy)Text analysis’ mini-series, and with that, to the very first post on my blog! Recently I was taking a class on ‘Data Science on Unstructured Text Data’, for which our final project was to create a tidyverse text analysis of any topic of our choice. While originally I set my sight on some deep topics, I ended up with something lighter this time.
